title: 1 Bed, Barbecue pavilion and picnic area, Oversized closets
posting_body: Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.
Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!

Polished kitchen countertops-Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher-Separate dining area-Oversized closets-Mountain views-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity-Wood-style plank flooring                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity-Ceiling fans in living areas and bedrooms
Professional onsite management-Barbecue pavilion and picnic area-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:

Only a small one-time payment-Onsite playground-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance-Landscaped courtyard with outdoor seating and firepit-Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Covered parking                                                                                         Featured amenity-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)
